name: Clue For Your Thoughts
description: In this murder mystery game, you are a detective tasked with solving the weird, strange and the weirder. Read through the general description, witness interviews, case facts, chat logs and sift through the evidence to figure out who did it. Once you've come to your conclusion, You can accuse who did it. Be careful, everyone has something to hide, but only one person did it. Leave no stone unturned, one small clue may be all you get. Investigate love triangles, discover hidden motives and question fashion decisions on your journey through 12 unique cases in Clue For Your Thoughts!
